content: After searching for the bridge I'm left with a blank white box. I have the option to push OK but I'm left with a blank screen. I can't get any further. I have rebooted the s20 ultra phone, uninstalled the app and installed it again but still the same issue
Connected on installation but unable to reconnect thereafter
Does not work as stated
Does not work with my Note10+
Not user friendly. I installed the app played around with it for about an hour and got nothing to set up. I believe there are better free versions out there
Worked well with iOS not with android though.
Very bad the some of the word are like cut in half and the notification box pop up but it doesn't say anything
not working very well and last update one year. however the app from philp better than this app
needs to be updated cant connect to bridge in widget
after finaly getting the app to connect with the bridge, i have issues that every time i try to create a widget it crashes the app! so disappointed in this app!
low reviews, tried it anyway. refund plus uninstall.

Do not bother with this app. It keeps losing the bridge. So every time you want to use this app you have to repair it to your phone. Even then it dosent always work. Like right now I am connected to the bridge but the app wont turn on a single light. Dont waste your time with this app

Request a refund. This app does not work. You cannot makes widgets, and the supplied ones don't work properly. The random setting is the same every time, and it takes a different app to get rid of it. Terrible.
DO NOT BUY! If you expect this app to be line the iOS one, you will be disappointed. There is no options to add scenes. Please add scene option to this app!
Keeps trying to find hue bridge
Sucks
Why can't we create scenes like in the IOS app?
Major battery drain.
When you simply touch the widget it slips into edit mode and starts moving around the screen. Pretty worthless.
I just downloaded this app, which I heard was a great app...and it will not even connect with my hue bridge...it let me use the scenes but wouldn't do anything else
Pixel xl puchased and refunded right after. When i select groups it closes the app every time. Reviews of this on youtube showed exactly what i wanted. But app need to be fixed.
Very poor will not control lights properly
App keeps on crashing can't do anything with it. Tmobile note 8
Oneplus 5T Immediate crash when I select the groups icons, which is the only reason I would buy this!
Whenever I tried to create a group the app crashed. Its worth .99
Doesn't connect to the bridge
Pixel XL, crashes opening Group Tab.
Galaxy Note 8. Crashes after I select the group button.
Samsung galaxy 7. Opening up the group's tab crashes the application
Doesn't work anymore, just stays searching for hub without finding anything! Also poorly designed compared to iphone version. Where do I get my money back?!?
Great app. Horrible bugs that cause it to crash constantly. Avoid this app.

I had to fricken buy this app so that I could operate the lights in my apartment. I would've given more than one star if there were ever a single time I opened the app to try to turn my lights on or off and it didn't crash on the spot
Widget keeps losing the bridge. Not reliable
Crashes does not work refund please
I have used this app for years, but recently I doesn't work on my GS7 edge. Please fix or refund.
Now it's unusable and crashes all the time after the last update
Don't really like how the widget looks on my screen, but good widget it you have a lot of groups or scenes and want a widget that can control all.

This app has all you could want to control your hue lights, especially after the new update. Crashes have been fixed, and the newly added controls are great. The only reason I give this a 4 instead of 5 is that in the new update you must click the on button to turn lights on instead of being able to just hit the desired brightness. If the dev makes the brightness control turn on the lights like it did previously, 5 stars all the way.
Couldn't get a refund fast enough because it keeps crashing. Please refund! Btw, I have the brand new droid turbo 2 so it's not a phone issue.

I have many scenes on my controller (due to having a Hue Tap), most of which I don't want visible to this app. Please add an ability to choose which scenes to show in the widget. Also the option to save more than 6 favorite scenes. This app has lots of potential. If be willing to pay for more features.
Just great. Hope more option will make it into this version

I gave this app 4 stars when it came out because it's a great and simple app.   The past few months the app force closes all the time, which makes it annoying to use because it has to reconnect to the bridge.
Configured groups, scenes, hub, nothing happens.
FC's mostly when WiFi gets disconnected. Other then that I love it. It's the best way to control my lights I've found so far. It's easy, clear and it works. Thank you.

The best widget, with EVERY feature I want and need.It let's you know when lights are on, has dimmer buttons, scenes, the whole bit. It will not stay configured. If i leave my home network and return the widget is mostly blank and unusable when i return forcing me to remove and replace it every time i need to use it. It now will not stay configured when I turn the screen off. This makes it completely unusable.
replyContent: Hey Wesley, try the new Version 😊
